RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.label: Predator
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.description: Predators are allowed to vore other pawns
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledManually: Currently allowed to vore other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledManually: Currently not allowed to vore other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledAutomatically: Currently allowed to vore other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledAutomatically: Currently not allowed to vore other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings

RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.label: Fatal
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.description: Other pawns are allowed to use lethal vore goals on this pawn
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledManually: Currently allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledManually: Currently not allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledAutomatically: Currently allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledAutomatically: Currently not allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipBlocked: Can not be fatally vored by other pawns.

RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.label: Endo
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.description: Other pawns are allowed to use non-lethal vore goals on this pawn
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledManually: Currently allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledManually: Currently not allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipEnabledAutomatically: Currently allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipDisabledAutomatically: Currently not allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
RimVore2.RV2DesignationDef.tipBlocked: Can not be non-fatally vored by other pawns.
